name: Shopping Simulator 2020
description:
Ride your shopping cart around a grocery store to collect as much toilet paper as you can before time runs out. Steal the toilet paper from other customers and avoid the store security personnel.

Future Updates Planned:

  • More Maps
  • Headgear/basic cosmetics

Other Ideas I Might Implement:

  • Online Multiplayer with up to 4 players.
  • Splitscreen Multiplayer.
  • More Gamemodes.
